Configurations.

Getters and setters for various injector configurations.

root_config

paths_config

maps_config

Format

A list of getters and setters for a configuration.

 unset()
 set(..., drop = TRUE)
 get(key)
 get_all()

Arguments

...

A (named) list of options.

key

A string (character vector of length one).

drop

A flag. Should previous options be dropped and replaced?

See also

define, get_configs, and reset.

Examples

reset()
#> [2017-06-16T07:33:27 CEST] Resetting modulr state ... OK
root_config$get_all()
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "modules" "module"  "libs"    "lib"     "."      
#> 
root_config$unset()
root_config$get_all()
#> NULL
root_config$set(c("my_modules"))
root_config$get_all()
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "my_modules"
#> 
root_config$set(c("my_great_modules"), drop = FALSE)
root_config$get_all()
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "my_modules"
#>
